name: Scrapyard
description: Scrapyard is a Top Side View Roguelike Shoot’em’up in which you control a robot in a abandoned Factory that has been sent there to clear the factory from defective remaining robots, there are five rooms to clear, our main character has to through all of them with only a shield that can sustain 3 hits, and a portion of his total energy, which only allows him to move, shoot or shield himself from projectiles at the same time, and also, whenever he uses a weapon in a room, said weapon will become unavailable in further rooms, this last two parts are our take on the sacrifice theme.
